title: I have installed pytorch from source, then how to install caffe2?
body_html:
I install pytorch from source:

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
python setup.py install

I try to use caffe2, then I run:
cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
It print False
I find if I install caffe2, I should run:

git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install

But it is similiar to pytorch. I have run python setup.py install when I install pytorch. What should I do?
body_text:
I install pytorch from source:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
python setup.py install

I try to use caffe2, then I run:

It print False
I find if I install caffe2, I should run:
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install

But it is similiar to pytorch. I have run python setup.py install when I install pytorch. What should I do?
body:
I install pytorch from source:
```
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
python setup.py install
```
I try to use caffe2, then I run:
`cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"`
It print False
I find if I install caffe2, I should run:
```
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install
```
But it is similiar to pytorch. I have run `python setup.py install` when I install pytorch. What should I do?
